Went yesterday around (6/24/19) around 10:30pmish and got a box of spicy chicken (which tasted old) and biscuits. My family ate the biscuits and noted it tasted funny but until now didn't realize there was MOLD on the bread. I love Popeyes but not cool!!! Will definitely not be eating at this location again due to the negligence in quality/freshness. Someone could get ill!
Long lines with horrible customer service smh I'll sue next time. If you don't have time, don't go!

The place is relatively clean. But after that, it's been 4 poor experiences in a row. They are glacial and take forever to take the order and even longer to fill it. In order to try and mitigate that, they have bins of chicken sandwiches at the counter. It doesn't help get the food quickly but it pretty much guarantees I get a sandwich that's not warm and at least 20 minutes old. 
Last time only two people in line in from of me but it took over 15 minutes to order and get my food, and the sandwich they gave me was already in that bin when I got in line. I'm done with giving this place chances.

I hate to give bad reviews, but the service at this Popeyes is horrible every time we go. The workers are unhelpful and slow. Today we waited 40 minutes for our food and they still managed to forget our biscuits and give us cold fries. The chicken is good, but it's not worth the hassle of such a poor experience.

This location is a consistent disappointment. Orders are incorrect, wait is long, food is not hot, employees seem stressed out & confused. I like the Popeye's chicken sandwich & this location wrecks it every time. Will not be going back.
Food is great but service is trash! The manager didn't listen to me when I ordered and rude. He was lazy.

I am upgrading the rating I gave because the prices have gotten a little better. 

Popeyes would get a 4 star review but unlike other restaurants in the area they stopped delivering. I can get KFC or chic fila delivered and 100 other places. Popeyes did deliver on grubhub and doordash but stopped altogether last month :(

First time ordering via drive through, they forgot a sandwich in my bag. Went back to get a refund. They wouldn't give back a refund. Only offered to remake the missing sandwich. Second time at drive through, asked for no sauce on a sandwich and it was drenched in sauce. Service here is AWFUL but damn it, that spicy chicken sandwich is bomb.

This place is ridiculous. I don't understand why it takes 30 mins to make a spicy chicken sandwich. I thought this was a fast food restaurant. Don't get me wrong the spicy chicken sandwich is really good imo, but it's not worth going to waste 30 mins (behind all the other customers that are also waiting) for just a sandwich. They need to fix this issue ASAP cause that is just bizarre. Also wouldn't recommend going through the drive thru because they're just as slow.

I do not typically come onto Yelp to bitch about food. BUT THEY DOWNSIZED THEIR RED BEANS AND RICE FOR THE SECOND TIME!!!!! the ratio is supposed to be 2/3 beans and 1/3 rice but what I just ate was most certainly half and half!!! long time customer is dissatisfied!!!! beware before purchasing!!!!

Shouldnt be listed as fast food. I am posting this while waiting for my food that I placed over 20 mins ago. The people behind me got food first and there has been no line the last 10 mins. As it finally came out... my fries were cold.
Repeated my order several times in the drive thru and they still got it wrong.     Did not ask me for drink or sides.   Customer service was horrible.

Ratchet a** Popeyes. My family and I are so done with this Popeyes chicken sandwich! Not only did they not have this imaginary sandwich, they were out of mac & cheese, french fries, and the carbonation was out of the soda machine! I wouldn't recommend this dump to my own worst enemy. Somebody should file an FCC complaint against this franchise for this imaginary chicken sandwich for the bait and switch tactics. How these gutless managers can leave their people working at the stores without the proper supplies is beyond me? Imagine being stuck in the drive-through to see a postage stamp size note saying out of this imaginary sandwich? This is got to be the worst establishment known to mankind. I would give this a minus star review but unfortunately I had to be generous and give them one. I doubt any of their managers or general managers have the guts to respond to this because they're just complete trash, I hate you Popeyes, I will never step foot in your dump ever again!

I love their spicy 3 piece chicken meal for lunch. It's a quick and delicious mid-day meal that gets me ready for the rest of the day. The hard part is picking one of their 7 sides, but I usually go with the cole slaw.

Hot garbage and the worst service. Apparently we can only get two sauces for three meals ordered?! 

The meals weren't even correct! LOL

This place is a joke. I don't know that I've ever visited and they actually have what I ordered. Today they were out of popcorn shrimp, green beans, & strawberry Fanta. Additionally, I ordered & paid for a 4 pc meal & get home to find 3 pieces, one of which was super small. The spicy chicken sandwich was dry so I definitely don't understand the hype. As much as I can't stand Chik-Fil-A and their values, I would probably choose them over this Popeyes location any day.

I came here last night around 10 pm and this man was walking around handling food with NO MASK on. This is absolutely ridiculous. If you don't want to wear a mask in your own time okay, but when you are working and handling food for others people you HAVE to wear one. It's the law. This is disgusting and he should not work here if he can't follow basic hygiene protocols? I told the guy at the window that he needs to be wearing a mask and he just said "oh he works here" like no shit he works there? He needs to be wearing a mask. Highly disappointed in this company.

Ordered from drive through. Here is my experience:
1. Fast service. There were a line of 5-6 cars in the drive through, but I got through the line in about 10 mins. 
2. Safety precaution done properly. No contact payment and food delivery. 
3. Food is fresh. Chicken sandwich is fantastic - the only chicken sandwich I found that can match chick fil a. I ordered both the spicy and classic. The spicy is the perfect spice level. 
4. Taking one star off because I ordered the 10 piece mixed chicken, but only got 9.
We love Popeyes however the drive-thru at this location always takes FOREVER. On average, we wait 10 minutes to just place our order - even if only 2 cars ahead of us. Super slow.
Worst experience.  Order takes forever and one staff only devoted to sandwiches while checker does everything else up front.  Would only use drive thru or wait until COVID is over.

If I could give negative stars I would! I love Popeyes but having to wait 30-40 minutes for a simple 2pc chicken meal is not okay nor worth it! Super disappointed. Will never come to this location again. I could have driven downtown to the MLK location and eaten by the time I got my food here.

Slowest Popeyes ever!!!! Waited 30 minutes for a single meal piece. I don't ever write reviews, but if the franchise owners are reading this..please fix this locations service. This is absolutely ridiculous! Smmfh I would give this place ZERO stars if it was possible.

when you ask for tartar sauce not once but twice for your shrimp. told its in the bag.. drive off and its creole cocktail sauce ugghhhh when you not a fan of tomato base condiments, this really ruined my meal !!

I used to think god wasn't real.  Then I had Popeyes! Every bite felt like I was one crunch closer to nirvana. The spice blend in the gravy felt more right than anything I've encountered in my years of life. The surf n turf meal came with minimal shrimp but after being simply forced to buy a "tacklebox" meal to satisfy my shrimp needs I felt rather pleased with my 9pm dinner and ecstatic to be blessed with another biscuit to smother with honey. My lady and I were very happy we made the spontaneous decision to detour to Popeyes as opposed to the casino as planned! I'mma keep doin' me, Popeyes, you keep doin' you

Location is close. Line is always a good 15-30 minute wait. They are always understaffed in the night. At this point I don't complain, I'm guessing it's poor management as that they never fix their problems
Avoid this location!! Extremely slow. Numerous occasions I have gotten stranded in a line and have waited over 30 mins.

Most dis-functional Popeyes on the planet.  Be prepared to wait.  They always seem to be in dis-array, confused, and fumbling.  For some reason it takes forever to get chicken- even when there is plenty of chicken sitting right there in plain view.  They are constantly asking each other which order they are working on and passing around receipts in complete and utter chaos.  I am not sure if anyone has ever trained anyone in this restaurant anything at all.  The simplest order can take 30 minutes in the evening.  It's been this way for months.  I am not sure what they are doing in this place.  I wish we had an alternative - I love their spicy chicken - but man it's crazy bad here.

TERRIBLE!!!! None of the employees could speak English and it took 15 min to get my food that I ordered inside. This whole business is a joke. I watched a bunch of employees clock in with no gloves on after being on break & then employees clocked in with gloves on handling the food after using the same machine the other person touched. A bunch of kids that work as slow as possible and just stare at you while you wait for your food. TALK ABOUT UNCOMFORTABLE!! Never coming back. I don't care how good the food is, the customer service is horrible and the employees are creepy.

Awful. Avoid if possible. Staff insults customers and lack basic problem solving skills you'd expect from a child. Go to one of their competitors instead.

I gave them several opportunities to resolve my issue, and even gave them the exact solutions to the problem. All they need to do was say "yes". But instead they rudely told me "It's our way, or you can leave". Not a single apology from management.

Here's the full story:
* I placed my order through the app for drive through pick up. 
* Arrived 20 minutes later to a line of cars in the drive through. 
* When it was my turn they told me to come inside. 
* They didn't even mention why, and made me interrogate them as to why. * They said they don't have my order. 
* Since I was in a line with four other cars, I can't just "turn around and come inside". I'm stuck in the line. I asked if I can just place my exact same order, and just pick it up at the window? You know, like a normal drive through experience.
* The employee put someone else on the intercom yelling loudly who just told me no, and I had to come inside. 
* I asked to place my order from the drive through and I'll pick it up inside. *  A third person was put on the intercom yelling that I can either come in or leave. 
* My proposed resolution would result in an experience nearly equal to what I expected (to pick up my order in the drive through). Their solution required threats, and for me to wait in the drive through, then wait again inside of the restaurant.
* After all of that, and going inside, the manager on duty said that the order was in the system after all.
* The manager offered no apology or alternative resolution.

I gave employees at this location multiple opportunities to do the right thing, and even gave them the solutions. They only needed to say "ok", but all the employees lacked any common decency, communication skills, critical thinking skills, and were all around awful human beings. What a waste of time that should have been a short and smooth transaction.

I had never been to Popeye's Chicken before, but people kept telling me to go and I have to say I wasn't disappointed at all. 

The chicken was good, but those potatoes... MMMMMM, I could have sat there all day and just ate those!

The prices were good, the place was clean. I do have to say if you like fried chicken try Popeye's, but don't forget to order that side of Potatoes.

I never leave reviews but have to for this location. Popeyes as an establishment is great with great food. However, this location is the worst I've been to of any fast food restaurant in my life. I stood inside waiting to order and was ignored for promptly 10 minutes, so decided to go through the drive-thru instead, after a long 20 minute wait in the drive-thru, they got my drink completely wrong and DIDN'T EVEN GIVE ME MY SIDE. Don't go here

This is unfortunately the closest Popeyes to my house. Not as generous as the other locations (the two on MLK). A lot of the time the strips here are extremely small--and they're definitely not cheap. The most annoying thing though is the sauces! It almost seems like company policy to be stingy with the sauces (they only give one-- or two if you're lucky) per large meal unless you specifically ask for more. I guess I usually forget to ask for more but most places are more realistic and I love my spicy sauces!  I guess I just expect more from a fast food place that costs as much as the average casual dining restaurant.

The service was horrible. They were out of the chicken sandwich, chicken tenders, ranch, fries, mac and cheese, and soda. When we asked if we could have two separate orders the woman working asked if there were any cars behind us. We said yes and she said "Okay hurry." When we went to the window we heard her say "I deserve a raise my customers are an inconvenience". Overall bad experience they were rude.
I ordered the hush puppy breaded shrimp basket comes with 1 side And a drink for 5.99 it was super good the spice on the shrimp was perfect. I have came to this location most of the time.

Not only do you have to wait 20+ minutes for in lobby orders, you won't get what you ordered. Asked for all dark meat and ended up with 3/5 pieces being White meat. Got jipped on the sides (picture included) and you can't even do their survey via reciept. I see what they did there. 

Sucks there aren't very many on the west side.

First time here ordered 8 piece family with mac & cheese with potatoes with gravy.  It's the best fried chicken I have had in along time..  Not greasy and  ALL  perfectly seasoned.  Thank you we will be back!

We love Popeyes but from previous reviews of this location and our dining experience yesterday there seems to be a lack of checking food that is served. I am hoping this can be corrected because we love the food and some of the value pricing.

We ordered the $10 bigger box and there were two obvious problems. My wife noticed our six tenders were instead three correct size tenders and the remaining looked like small boneless wings. They corrected this like this was normal and no apology on their mistake. The only reason I am writing this review is the second item I found. One biscuit had mold on it and was pretty obvious. When I brought it up to the manager he snatched it from me grabbed another one and once again no apology. 

This location has an obvious problem with customer service and making sure their customers have a good dining experience. I do hope this location makes some changes for the better.

Upon entering this location you will see an abandoned RV at the entrance. This RV has been there for months and counting.

This location always has long lines inside and outside, as well as poor customer service. 

Recommendations: Offer prompt and courteous service to ALL customers, including the Delivery Drivers. Acknowledge when a customer is present, and if the order is not ready, be courteous and offer an approximate wait time until order is ready.
Food. Good. Chicken. Great. Boneless. Amazing. Sides. Good. Popeye would be proud. Eat.
Out of Diet Coke dry chicken and promotion ads are posted that are no longer available
Worse chicken I have ever had...dried and salty!  Freddy and Safeway has better chicken then this place.  If you want cardboard, or dried rotted wooded sprinkled with salt then this place is for you.

The week this location opened (Nov 16th, 2006) this place was a BIG mess.  people lining up for chicken like no other!  a week rolls by and business has slowed (which i like).

I give this location 4 stars because they are open until 1AM!

downside:  jambalaya comes as a meal, not a side order.  boo!  

oh well, gotta love that chicken!

Ha ha ha rotflmfao I just had to share this one C'mon Popeyes you can at least try to do better than this really you just squeezed this piece til it formed to the shape of your palm what do you call this one "spicy chicken palm tenders" and for that I regret giving you a s second stance you have failed...

Ordered a sandwich and a rippin chicken big box meal. Did not receive the sandwich, and only received one large chicken strip, along with the two sides. It was not worth $10 for a single chicken strip and some mashed potatoes, though it was hot and tasty.

They have a family meal on the menu listed at $19.99. when I ordered it, it came out to $24.99. they then said I needed a coupon to order my item at the price it was LISTED ON THE MENU. false advertising and sneaky

Went in today around 7pm and it was pretty full. There was one girl working the register (never got her name) but she was wearing a hat and had two braids. She was doing super well especially since they had a rush of people and most of them were using the same coupon. I could see she really cared about her job and the customer as well. I hope management sees this review because that girl took initiative with taking all the orders during the rush by herself.

This is Popeye's. If you don't already know Popeye's I'm not sure how you've made it this far in life, but I'm glad you've found them now. 

As far as fast food goes this is hands down by far the best we have. If we had In 'n' Out that might make it a race but we don't so Popeye's wins by a landslide. 

I used to mess around with the fried chicken until I realized the chicken strips also come in the spicy option, plus there's more surface area to cover with the crispy, wonderful coating. They are also much easier to dip into the blackened ranch sauce which really is half the reason to come here. Dip everything you possibly can into this sauce, it is a gift from the very Heavens above. Hallelujah and amen! 

The sides are ok, when they're fresh they're pretty good (I usually go with cajun fries) but it's not often that they're fresh. Just dip them in the ranch and you'll be fine. 

A hint if you're new to the drive thru here, check your order! I've always gotten mine correctly but all my friends swear that they only get a correct order about 60% of the time. 

So in the end the true lesson here is expect fast food, expect to pay a bit more than is normal for fast food, and put blackened ranch sauce on anything you can. I've given the place an extra star solely for that sauce, need I say more?

This location sucks. the workers are rude as hell, i believe ava was her name, she was so snooty and i asked a question and she rolled her eyes and pointed too the window... i was like wtf okkkk. Then there was two guys in the back talking shit and i heard it so ya anyways don't waste ur money at this location. They over charged me and didn't even get the order right.
For fast food chicken strips, this place is the best. Always hot. Always crunchy. Always fresh. Always filling.
Bad service 9/10 chance they will get you're order wrong. Been here twice and had hope, but I guess they still haven't learned how to read orders. Not happy and not coming back.

I am just so disappointed.  I work so hard for what little money I bring home to my family, and then to buy something that was burnt, and non edible. it infuriates me to no end!  Had to throw it all out.  Tasted like burnt grease.  Called them.....they would not answer the phone.  Why is Corporate Popeyes allowing this to happen??  I have been to the Popeyes on N. MLK, and have NEVER had a problem.  I have been to two others in the past week, (Salem, and Beaverton), and they both have been a nightmare!  Such a waste of money.  Just not right.

Sign on the door said, "No pickles, and nothing to drink but lemonade." This seems to be a common occurrence at this location. My chicken sandwich was over cooked and so were the MAC and Cheetos (Gross)! This establishment is filthy and stinks. The employees need a lesson in customer service and to lay off the weed!!

This is the worst fast food joint I've ever been to in my life, and I grew up in a hellhole on the edge of East Texas, so that's saying a lot. We walked in at roughly 8:30, it took them 15 minutes to get our food ready, and my order was wrong. I went back and asked if they could correct it, they said "no problem" and then they screwed it up again. These were not complicated instructions; Whopper Jr. with cheese, mayo only. The first time it came with all veggies and no cheese, the second time everything on it. I just asked for my money back at this point. We then tried to leave and had to get a manager to unlock the door, because what place worth its salt doesn't lock the inside before 9:00 pm?!
Another fun fact, the bathroom has no soap dispenser in the men's room. There's literally no way to wash your hands; the thing had been ripped off the wall seemingly long ago. It astounds me that the place hasn't been shut down. Keep driving to the McDonald's at the next exit, it's a well oiled machine compared to this dumpster fire of a restaurant.

EMPLOYEES and CUSTOMERS BEWARE of this crooked establishment!!!!!!!!!!

Please boycott and do not eat at this Burger King! The DM obviously is a thief and steals minor employees pay checks! His name is Gilberto Hernandez! Don't believe anything he says because he will lie and lie then stop answering your calls! It's been over six weeks now with lie after lie after lie as well as ridiculous excuses like it's my child's fault for not reporting it to his manager which is a HUGE lie we even contacted him 4 weeks ago! At this point I feel it is theft!! Why would a district manager lie week after week after week! Yeah he's a thief! My lawyer and ICE will be investigating this whole establishment! 
CUSTOMERS and EMPLOYEES BEWARE
There were only 3 cars in the drive thru and I waited almost 15 minutes. Food was good but the soda was weird. If you aren't in a rush this place is probably fine.
El peor BK que he ido, súper caliente, la orden estaba mal, cucarachas, área de juegos súper sucio, mesas y sillas sin limpiar...un asco de sitio! No vuelvo!

This is the worst Burger King ever!! The employees are rude and don't have the slightest clue what customer service means. On top of that the food smells. I ordered a kids meal for my son and the chicken nuggets smelled. When I asked for a refund the girl was nodding her head the whole time with a mug on her face. I was told my refund was processed but they couldn't give me a receipt so I took the Team lead word on it, I never saw my refund. I was lied to. One star is generous.

Normally fast food restaurants aren't worth the time reviewing but this place is so bad I couldn't resist. I asked for 2 orders of onion rings and they gave me 2 orders of fries. I asked for 2 Dr. Peppers and they gave me 2 Cokes. I asked for zesty sauce and they gave me none. I asked for a spicy chicken sandwich and they gave me a regular chicken sandwich. I was the only car in the drive thru and the restaurant was practically empty so it's not like the employees were busy. And they made me drive up to sit in the parking lot even though no cars were behind me. When I was a teenager I worked in fast food and I know that the time a car waits at the window is recorded so that's why this burger king always asks you to pull up front to sit in the parking lot forever so that they aren't running up the timer at the window. Every time I've gone the idiot employees seem to be high because they can't stop laughing and telling you to repeat your order 4 times. I've only been at night so I can't comment on the breakfast shift employees.
super happy with my meal. my #2 came out hot and the jalapenos were even hotter. fries hot and food came out quick. I'm here to report 5stars.

The food was fresh and the front of the restaurant was clean but the kids area was terribly dirty.  I liked the updated soda dispenser though.  Get the kids area cleaned up and this bk would be five stars for a fast food place.
One of our reporters had a flat at this company - met with police and BK staff. Before his tow could get there BK had it towed for 193.39 so at least they got it their way.

I stopped by with the kiddos to get them some ice cream. We sort of gave up on this Burger King a few years back because the service was so poor. It was a completely different story today. Stephanie was absolutely wonderful and greeted us with a smile and so we left with a smile. I think we'll give Burger King another chance all because of Stephanie.
The hours posted are incorrect. I went there at 7:30 and the door was locked and their were people hanging out inside and they told me they were closed.

I wish I could give this location a DOUBLE ZERO! My daughter worked at this location and was let go based on the General Managers, VICTORIA, personal feelings. My daughter was let go with no explanation other than the GM clearly did not like her. I called and asked her for the reasoning and she told me that my daughter walked away from her (because she was constantly approached by her rude and demanding attitude; she walked away to call me (her mother)) and she advised my child that she is to never walk away from her. I don't know who this woman thinks she is but she has a VERY POOR attitude with NO management skills. I have no idea how this woman is even a GM with such a lack of respect for others. This location also has RATS in the play area with NO A.C. There is no soap dispenser in the male restroom. How are employees washing their hands before returning back to work?! CUSTOMER SERVICE IS HORRIBLE!!!! None of the employees show up for work so they close the dine-in and make customers use the drive-thru. My child worked 40+ hours at this location because no one wanted to show up for work and the minute Victoria arrived with her nasty attitude she fired her instantly. I will be reporting this location to the Department of Health next! HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE MANAGEMENT AND LOCATION!!!!!! - Celes Currie

This Burger King has to be the worse location I've ever had the dishonor of visiting.
Each time they ask me to pull to the front, even if my order is small.  The fries are with cold and way over salted or both.  One day they messed my order up so bad, I ended up waiting for close to an hour to get my food.  All while we were waiting we were placed under a tornado warning.  This place is so dysfunctional and no one seems to know what anyone else is doing.  Nothing is ever fresh, made correct or worth a red cent.  I'll drive far out of my way to get a good whopper to avoid this whole in the wall.

This is one of the worst Burger King's I have ever been to in all of my 83 years! As you walk in the whole floor was wet and water was dripping from the ceiling, and the windows and tables were filthy!  The fries were cold!

It's a fast food chain restaurant. We know what to expect when we go to these. It has nothing to do with the tow company that is contracted by the business. It is about the quality of food,value for the cost, cleanliness and customer service. We got all these plus the store owner stopped by to we how we were doing and even explained hot to score a free burger on a future visit u completing survey on back of receipt.

I can honestly agree. This location sucks! Closed several hours before closing. Trust me I LOVE BURGER KING, but for me to right a negative review about them, that says a lot! Corporate Management NEEDS TO SEE WHAT'S REALLY GOING ON AT THIS LOCATION! Until things CHANGE for the BETTER, I'm taking my Business elsewhere.Sorry BK but you have lost yet another Loyal Customer.

This place sucks...never do they get your order right... Plus the whopper is no longer the whopper of old... I use to love Bk ...Now that they Killed the king they have ruined the whopper too. And this particular Burger king SUCKS... As it seems they all do these days. Dont waste your time or money...

90's classic Burger King layout! Truly reminds me of my childhood. It is fairly clean for the age. Our service was quick and prompt. Food was good. It has a vintage play area which not a negative in the slightest. I thoroughly enjoyed the time capsule that is this BK. Thank you for keeping the decor for this 90's kid. Thanks again!

Once again I'm super happy with my food it was hot and it was on time. My number 2 came out with lots of jalapenos and hot melted cheese and my fries were on fire. I also ordered more food to go and it was very on time and hot. Once again you get 5 stars

This place has no right calling itself Burger KING , This place needs to close down ASAP, Wife reluctantly went there today for lunch but guess what ? They were out of burgers WTF!!!!! What a comedy dump
Whatever you do... Don't look behind the bench seats in the kiddie area.  I looked back there and saw hundreds... hundreds! ... of dead bugs, mostly crickets. This place is just gross.

Didn't eat here but tried. Went to order and was told that they were out of hamburgers. Also the store was very old and dirty. Would not advise anyone to eat here. I'm glad they were out of hamburgers because we probably would have gotten sick.

I dunno...maybe a conspiracy - to buy land for other developments - by complaining of Value Menu or Meal Deal 'food size' - so "really".

I don't always eat fast food, but BK has never let me down.

Floors could be checked, there was some ice that had melted, near the railing, and a single mustard packet had opened & caused 'fusion' to other packets...store was empty - maybe a couple of applicants - but 8 people showed up in 20 minutes.  Must be busy randomly.

Liked the $1 chicken sandwich - another spot - won't name - raised their 'value meals' by another $0.60.  Not cool.  

Manager ACTUALLY present, wow - staff is friendly - and courteous.

No Speak - didn't check restrooms but table tops were clean.

Menu seemed appreciable....I actually considered a regular menu item.

Wow! I love Burger King, but this was horrible. Multiple health violations, bathrooms looked like a tornado went through. Daughters chicken nuggets were cold. Not like warm, but cold. Wife's chicken sandwich was over cooked. My Whopper was the correct temperature, but I am not sure what was wrong. It had no taste. There was one employee that cared and was working. The rest were eating and avoiding work. This place probably doesn't deserve 1 star

My mom went there today get some dinner. When she drove up to the menu it took them a long time get answer her. Finely when she order and drove up to the window she notice that the counter was gross and didn't look like had been clean for awhile. When she got home, the fires were cold. It was like they had been sitting out for awhile. I had so much of their ketchup sauce that put on there burgers. My mom and I end up throwing it away. Will not be back!!! I really hope Burger King's corp. reads these comments!!! If the counter next to window is gross then most likely the rest of the place is. That can make people sick! The manager needs to get their heads out of their asses and make their employees clean!!!!

On my way to church I stopped at burger King to get a chicken sandwich biscuit. I went through the drive thru, it was good until I bit into it and the chicken was raw!!!! They said they've been having that issue before REALLY BURGER KING?

Wow, my boy and I love some Burger King but this place had one of the rudest drive through order takers i have ever experienced in my life and I'm old!  Not responding to me at the order kiosk for 10 minutes I said "hello" she said "hello" with no other response.  I said "do you want to take my order" and she said "hello".  I was figuring they were having issues but the 4 cars ahead of me didn't seem to so i said "can you hear me"  and she said "no"?!?  I pulled up to the window to one of rudest customer service people i have ever come across.  After a little rude banter from her I gave her the finger and a little piece of my mind and drove off.  Very sad...
This place is always slow and disappointing.  The staff have a "I don't care" attitude if their slow or messes your order up.

I have NEVER been to a fast food place as bad as this one. I happen to Love their burgers. But the service and upkeep of this place is HORRIBLE. Just a couple of examples: constantly "our ice cream machine is out", "we only have lemonade", "sorry no ice", " sorry play area closed needs repair or cleaning " I can go on and on! Some employees clearly do not want to be there either. Treat you like you are bothering them if you go up to order. Just close already! Or bring in totally new ownership/management! Jesus!!

I never would take time to write a review on a fast food place but this place is so bad that i had to. Im in college so i drive down to san marcos from buda everyday and this bk is on my way. I have stopped because the 6 times ive been there not once did my order get made correctly. In fact it was so wrong last time i went i thought someone was trying to play a prank on me! Its also disgusting inside and all the employees seem high, if your looking for quick and easy you'd get a better meal at the gas station right across the highway
Sat in the drive thru for 10 min and no one ever came . Went to the front and the lady was sitting on the counter BS service

This is THE worst Burger King in the Austin area. If your passing through DON'T stop!! I have tried to stop by 4 different times while in town for work.  I waited in the drive through for 30 minutes (stayed to see how long it would take) and I was the only one and only ordered a breakfast burrito!  Pull up to the drive through at 9am for some breakfast and no one answers. Walk up to go inside to see if i would have better luck than the drive thru but guess what? The doors are locked!!  Person inside just stared at me walked away.  Service is horrible and obviously reflects on the management

The positives: 
Food was prepared quickly and was pretty good for fast food (better than Mcdonalds to me) and even better is the large playground for kids. Very convenient that you can sit an eat in the play area too so you can always keep an eye and ear on the little ones. The employees were really nice. 

However, the negatives:
The playground area smells pretty bad and could use some air fresheners or something. Also, the floor and tables were pretty dirty and looked like it had been a while since anyone swept, mopped, or wiped down tables.

I ordered the Chicken Club Salad... burger lettuce, sliced tomato and chicken patty. No salad mix, no bacon, no croutons, charged full price this is ridiculous that this franchisee is allowed to use Burger Kings name.

This place is the worst. I live near and this is the closest place to eat near me so I would love to come here often. In the few short months I have come here and had credit card machine down, no ice available, soda machine down, missing food, wrong soda, wrong order, cheese missing from sandwiches, rude service, etc. The culture here is so screwed, there are no standards and no leadership. Today I ate in for breakfast and waited 15 mins for a sandwich and then I watched the next three guests wait 10 mins or more for food, all while manager and staff singing and screwing around. I wish the owner knew how bad this staff is screwing him. I called and complained once and the manager basically said she has bad people and can't do anything about it. No doubt being a salaried manager at a fast food place is hard, I've done it, but if you give up you need to leave not just ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ your shoulders and keep doing the same subpar job everyday. 

Tl;dr Dont come here, something won't be right, you will regret it. Chick-fil-a and Mcdonalds are one exit down.

I feel bad for the owner of this place.. it needs better management and consistency. They have messed up my order several times! The drive thru takes forever, I might as well head home and come back 30 minutes later. They always forget or mess something up.

Over the last two years, nothing has changed.

I will never go there again...I'd like to give them ZERO stars!

I live right across the highway from this place and they WOULD get quite a bit of business from me if they didn't suck so bad. Yesterday they were so horrible that I demanded my money back after waiting for 30 minutes to get my food. Last week the lobby was just closed when I went by for my lunch break. A lady came to the door and was VERY rude about it... horrible store that I doubt I will ever go back to. Hopefully corporate can step in and clean house...

This BK is fine in the morning to about noon when the early shift is working. That all changes in the afternoon and evening when the more seedy second shift comes in. This crew has constant turnover and most of them aren't experienced enough to get any order correct the first time.

You can expect about the same situation at the BK several miles north on IH-35 and FM 2001 because it's run by the same owners. They have constant turnover and nobody is experienced enough or cares enough to get things right.

The owners must not be too nice to work for, years ago they had nice management and good employees. All of them bailed out and have since been replaced with anyone they can find.

i went to this location around 7:15am to pick up breakfast before work. i drove up to the drive-thru and nobody ever took my order. in fact the place looked closed! apparently it opens at 6am. 
not to mention, when i do eat there when they are open, the employees are NOT professional. 

i'm so surprised this place is still open, i'd beg the owners to just shut it down.

Maybe the worst Burger King I've ever been to. The guy taking my order barely paid attention to what I was saying. he handed me a drink cup and as I went to get the drink found that the drink dispenser was broken. I stood up front for 3 minutes trying to get someones attention but they were literally all focused on the drive-Through with their backs toward the front. Nobody would help me. I waited as they all buzzed around and watched my order come up as it sat under the heat lamp for another 5 minutes. Finally in frustration I demanded my money back! Don't bother with this Burger King it is dirty and the customer service was REALLY bad.

How in the heck are they in business... this place is so disgusting. I should have known by the way it even looks outside looks like 1990. Food and service was horrible. Even the toy they gave for my grandkid was broken. Horrible
Quite possibly the worst, dirtiest, most unfriendly BK on the planet - do better wow - the Corp office should shut you down

I really honestly feel very sorry for the folks that work at this Burger King. My daughter is sick and wanted a value chicken. I promise you that I waited 25 minutes from start to end. I am appalled but something is not right there. I have 35 years of retail experience and have NEVER seen anything like this! Something here is wrong and I suspect that there is no management assigned to this store. If it is, I have no words. I hope the situation is resolved soon for the employees and customer sake. Buda deserves better than this.

No uniforms, everyone is wearing personal street clothes.  Drive through is closed, come machine doesn't allow you to choose different flavors.

In addition, only three customers in the place, yet it took 20 minutes to make my order and it was wrong.

Also, why are we playing religious movies at a restaurant?

This is quite possibly the dirtiest fast-food restaurant I've ever been to.
I warn you.. if you've got families and are driving on IH-35 and think you should stop for a snack, lunch or event a bathroom break, don't.

They've gotten our order wrong every time we went (we've got 4 times over the last 4 years). They didn't apologize or care. One time, they got everyone in our groups order wrong (went with my parents because we were at Home Depot... and it was the closest place and had a playground for the kiddos). 

What sparked me wanting to write this was my mother mentioned she wrote a letter to Burger King Corporate about her experience (something I've never heard of her doing) and they wrote back that the problem had been corrected. 

This past Monday, I was driving home from Austin and my daughter had to use the bathroom. I thought we'd give it one more chance.. maybe get a shake. The bathroom light in the ladies room was out (according to my 5 year old) and the men's room commode looked like a poo-bomb went off in it 2 weeks earlier and hadn't been cleaned. The rest of the bathroom looked like it smelled.

I don't like giving negative reviews.. but I really feel I need to warn you. Run fast, run far from this one. There's PLENTY of other options right around there.



Over the last few years we've stopped in a few times.

Cheeseburgers made with sausage patties (incompetent employees) 
Either their meats are mislabelled or they generally just don't care about customer satisfaction. 
My sister broke out in hives and I got sick. THANKS BURGER KING

This has got to be the worst ran Burger King ever!! Why is this place even open!! Went through drive through the first thing she says is we are out of hash browns, coke & croissants.. what ?? Mind you this has happened before, you get we are out of this and this before you even order...Really.. Another day I went in and ordered 3 whopper meals she ask size and the drink gave her those, then when I get my order there was no fries, when I said I'm missing the fries the girl that took my order says you didn't order fries.. Really!! What part of whopper meals didn't she understand? She proceeded to argue with what I ordered.. stupid little girl.. manager finally says ok I'll just give you the fries!! Wait isn't that part of the meal/ combo!! 
This location is the joke of Kyle, people say you should ask them what they have BEFORE you order, how this location is still open is beyond me.. HORRIBLE!!!

The (Burger) King is dead! Thank (the) god (of your choice) for Dairy Queen!

About once a year for probably the last 15 years I will stop at this BK. I can say finally I have learned my lesson. 

It's never gotten better and it never will. 
My last experience was late last week when my wife woke up a little late for work and suggested we go to the drive-thru since "there is never anyone there and it will be quicker than anywhere else in the area." 

I will say that I have stopped at the "new" BK in Buda when heading north... It's basically the newer baby brother of the Kyle location. The newness has worn off and it's no better than big brother further south on the highway. But I digress..

Going through the drive-thru this particular morning we each ordered a Croissan'wich meals..
Both of the croissants were partially burnt, and tasted burnt. The grease dripping out of mine would have required a full roll of paper towel to clean up if it was spilt on a surface. The eggs, or whatever they really are, we're rubbery, as in now I know that rubber chickens lay eggs for the BK Corp. 

I realize that fast food is not fine dining, and my expectations are not high, but this was inexcusable. The person at the drive through window chuckled when they handed the bag to me almost as if he knew what was in store when we opened the BK brown bag of doom (B.K.B.B.O.D).

The dime sized paper weights covered in Vaseline, or as they are called on the menu, hash browns, are probably not biodegradable. They'll be in the landfill for eternity. 

And finally there are the fountain drinks...
For as long as I've been going to this BK the ratio of water to syrup always equals flat. I've left sodas in a can in my car for 3 days that weren't as flat as what comes from their fountain. Kyle is not known for its good tasting water and I believe this place has a hose running straight from a spigot to the machine. This is the kind of fountain drink you have to chew to get it down. I don't understand considering the other fast food places in the area don't have that issue. I have told people taking my order in days gone by that I have two words for them, water filter. 

I took two bites of the Croissan'wich I ordered and stuffed in back in the B.K.B.B.O.D. My wife maybe took two more bites than I did and followed suit.

I saw some buzzards next to the road feasting on whatever it was they were feasting on and tossed a few of the paper weights covered in Vaseline. I'm not positive but I think the buzzards flipped me the bird.

I thought I had learned my lesson after the night I went in here and ordered a Whopper with cheese and watched them unwrap a previously made Whopper, slap a piece of cheese on it and put it in the microwave, tomatoes, lettuce, onions, MAYO and all for a full minute.... After this breakfast experience, I am not going back ever again. 

Even the entrance from the side facing Home Depot, with it's misspelled words on the sign all the way up to the stair like pavement.... It's literally as if they paved over stairs they had laid flat on the dirt. The whole thing just screams, "Whataburger is just a little further up the road".

This place is ridiculous! No friendly staff, food was mediocre but the kicker was that I came here so my kids could play on the INDOOR playground but the air conditioner was out in the playscape area! Are you KIDDING ME?! Why wouldn't you tell me that when I'm ordering my food and saying to the kids, "Yay, we get to play!" Don't come here if you have kids. They could pass out in that heat and DIE. Burger King should be ashamed.

I have never been a fan of burger kings, but this one is awesome. I bring my kids every week after gymnastics and today is the first time I let them play in the playscape room. It's clean, air conditioned , huge and closed off (so no need to worry about bothering guests eating lol). Their food is always fresh and the workers are nice!
Also-I fed my kids for $4!

This is by far the worst Burger King I have ever been to i live nearby so sometimes I don't have a choice and every single time I am highly disappointed in the customer service the quality of the food and overall care of the location. they had signs that been broken and it's almost a year and they still haven't fixed that, the orders are always wrong I ordered a breakfast burrito and inside it was a sandwich slice of cheese not even melted wrapped in a burrito you go there anytime takes forever for anyone to answer you in the drive-through I went there at 9:00 AM nobody saids nothing to you I drive up to the window nobody manning the window no one even to come to recognize me I see employees laughing and joking and I beep the horn and they totally ignore me very unprofessional and to top it off last week a huge dead rat was on their sidewalk they didn't have the decency to clean it up that rat was there till the damn 3-4 hours later it's disgusting i'm tired of giving them the benefit of doubt because they're located near me but today drew the line I'm sick and tired it will never go there again disgusting and dirty place.

So online it says this Burger King is open till midnight ...I went by there at 11:13 pm n the guy says they close at 11, so I told him " online it states your hours are till 12, he looked at me like I was speaking a foreign language n closed the drive thru window ...I was like uh ok ...So maybe they should change the info ...just saying...

Just tried the new "taco". First of all, it looks nothing like the picture. It's a taco fried in grease, just like the one at Jack in the Box, only worse. Total s+×t. Done with BK. It gets worse every time I go there. Only ate a bite, but I hope I don't get sick.

I would give negative 5 if it was an option. completely mismanaged!! staff and assistant manager rude. had to repeat my order 4  times to 2 people, finally a manager fixed it in the most rude way possible. All I wanted was 10 8pc spicy nuggets. they have a promotion "8pc for $1" they kept insisting on 10pc, I had to keep pointing to the "giant sign" behind them. they practically tossed the food in a bag and shoved it toward me. it was a very easy and clear order. That location needs to start over and replace the worst staff I have ever seen!!

This has got to be the worst ran Burger King ever!! Why is this place even open!! Went through drive through the first thing she says is we are out of hash browns, coke & croissants.. what ?? Mind you this has happened before, you get we are out of this and this before you even order...Really.. Another day I went in and ordered 3 whopper meals she ask size and the drink gave her those, then when I get my order there was no fries, when I said I'm missing the fries the girl that took my order says you didn't order fries.. Really!! What part of whopper meals didn't she understand? She proceeded to argue with what I ordered.. stupid little girl.. manager finally says ok I'll just give you the fries!! Wait isn't that part of the meal/ combo!! 
This location is the joke of Kyle, people say you should ask them what they have BEFORE you order, how this location is still open is beyond me.. HORRIBLE 
8/7/20 gave them a dry for breakfast again got told only have ham!! Why is this location even still ope!! Corporate needs to close this laughing stock down or fire all employees and start over..
Went or tried to go through drive through, sat there a good 2 minutes! I honked horn wondering if they were open. Guy says don't honk your horn again I am busy with a customer inside! We drove off!

I have to say that out of all the Burger Kings around, this one is the hind quarter of the mule.  Sometimes they are friendly and other times they are put out.  Each time we go I am hoping for a better experience setting, say being an off day or just not grooving in sync.

Thirty five percent of the time the orders are wrong, this time the Whopper of all burgers just did not taste Whopper-ee, plus the tomato was like the heel of bread, nasty.   

Just be forewarn, if you like the excitement  of not knowing what you are going to get or the taste of the burger or what is sticky on the floor, this is the place for you.

You are taking changes here at this particular Burger King.  I expect the competition will start brewing when Buda and Kyle starts getting more restaurants.

The Bonus part of the meal is; when they get the order wrong, you get the complete meal item free.  I guess that does help with calming the occasional order miss.

This Burger King absolutely sucks! Second time I have been here and they are rude and out of items. Today no coke or dr. Pepper, no French toast sticks. When ordering my food he did not confirm order and the screen is broken! We did not get a orange juice that was ordered. Last week went for breakfast and they were out of eggs! Will not waste my time here again. I will go 5 minutes down the road and go to buda BK. Get a new crew and manager to run your place correctly

Thought I would grab a quick lunch on my way home. Settled for a semi-healthy grilled chicken sandwich. WTF? I don't know why I am so surprised  Chicken Sandwich..........really?! Corporate was emailed.

Slower than molasses... just keep driving, there are options one exit down. 

If staff had even acknowledged the wait I wouldn't have reviewed.

The past 3 or 4 times I've tried to go to this location, they're closed. I've gone during regular posted business hours, so they're closing the store several hours early. I went just yesterday around 1pm, and the drive-thru was blocked by wet floor signs. I tried to go to the lobby, and there was a sign on the door that said "drive-thru only." They claimed the system had just gone down, but this is a common occurrence at this location. Every time this happens, I have to either go to the other location a few exits down, or just go to a different, closer restaurant altogether. I don't think the higher-ups realize this is going on, so I already sent them an email letting them know how this store is operating.

So I got to the Burger King at 7:30 a.m. and they were still closed and this is happened for the second week in a row. It's kind of frustrating that Buda has to have the horrible Burger Kings. And what really sucks is the other Burger King in Buda is just as bad. I posted a picture of the employee ignoring me at 7:35 a.m. even though his sign said 7 a.m. he just kept ignoring me no matter how much I knocked on the glass. I hope this Burger King goes out of business. Maybe we can get a new Better Burger King in a new better owner. Don't bother calling Burger King they disconnected their number so you can't contact them or complain. Why does Corporation let him get away with so much I think Burger King corporation must be going financially under aswell. The Burger King in San Marcos went out of business and so will this one.
I think the customer service was good but the burger was cold! Fries and nuggets were good too but who likes a cold burger.
Ordered 2 Imposible Whoppers. Burnt to the point the edges were crispy and a rude woman with glasses taking orders. Whats there to like about this Burger King?

We've been to this BK spot a few times now all of which have taken awhile to get our food. No problem. This last time however takes the cake! There were clearly two new people working the back that had no clue what they're doing. The manager was creator no help as she continued to call out orders rather than direct her staff how to efficiently get food on the line and out to customers. I'd also like to note the other staff meme vet just standing in front and starring back rather than jumping on the line to lend a hand. 

Best part... finally get the burgers and there's a great big hair in it. I can understand that sort of thing happens -unfortunately- but we will never be back to this spot.

I stopped in recently at about 7:30 in the evening.  I was hoping to try their new "Impossible Whopper" 'cause my doctor told me to eat more veggies.  I stood at the counter for a long time.  No one bothered to come out front and take my order.   Often, when I drive by there in the evening, they don't even have the lights turned on outside or on the signs.    Total dud!

Been here about 5 times or so. And every time, they have or/are just ran out of items. Today, it was sourdough buns, cheesy tots, ice cream, and some fountain drinks. Unfortunately, everything I wanted to eat. Not really sure why it happens here so much.

Come on Yelp. There has got to be a way to give negative stars. It's not possible to run this place any worse. 

I'm positive if you let a group of toddlers run this location it would run better. 

Usually they are out of something, or your order is missing an item. But I just spend 10 minutes at the window waiting for them to take my order. 

Twice I asked if they were ready. 

The answer "sorry, we are really backed up". 

I am the only car in the drive through. 

Do yourself a favor whoever owns this franchised location. Just bulldoze it. You obviously can't get your sh*t together. 

It's a garbage expierences once every six months I try to eat here. 

At least your consistent.

There is a reason why this place has a low rating and a reason why I have not been back in years. I stopped for breakfast this morning because my kid wanted food. I stopped at the speaker, ordered my food,  and sat at the drive through lane for over 15 minutes. There was one car in front of me. I saw the woman working the window open the window and close it again and she disappeared. What takes so long where it takes over 15 minutes to give a guy his order? I ended up leaving. 

It is a sad state of affairs when fast food workers want $15+ an hour and they can not even work a drive  through correctly. There is a reason why I have not been back to this location. I do not plan to come back either.

I'm not going to give this place any more chances. It's always dirty, disorganized and the employees don't seem to be familiar with good customer service. Today, they don't have soda nor can they take credit cards. It's always something. The BK franchise needs to check into this and fix it or close it down. One star is very generous.

This particular Burger King has never been known for its cleanliness or customer service, but ever since they've done a complete remodel it's a little cleaner. But their customer service still has to be one of the worst, and I completely understand that this is a fast food place but come on. I only stop here strictly for convenience as do many other truck drivers as they do have plenty of room for trucks, only reason they get that second star! Sometimes a smile and a "how you doing " goes a long way.

My bill was $8.22 and I always try to be helpful when I pay. If I don't have the exact change, I'll do my best for the cashier.
Which is why I handed her $23.25.
A $20, 3 singles and a quarter. That's correct, I had no 10s or 5s.
I'm always amazed when someone who handles cash and makes change for a living, looks at this sum and starts drooling.
And then looks at me and says, "It's $8.22."
And hands me the wrong change.
Moving on, she asked if I wanted catsup. I said, "No thanks."

As I was eating my fries later I discovered 7 catsups in the bag.

Only because nothing lower than 1 Star....Drive-thru order over lunch....

Couldn't take credit cards because machine not working....
Ordered a frozen coke.....Machine is broken
Ordered a shake....Machine is broken....
Ordered a burger with cheese, mayo, pickles, onions only and employee couldn't figure out how to enter it...
Ordered a side, but then told that side couldn't be included in a meal....
At checkout gave us the wrong drinks....
Gave us the correct drinks, but the lids not attached, which could have been a disaster....
Then had to ask for straws....Why even partially put lids on cups if not providing straws?....
Pathetic excuse for management....Needs to just fail and get a franchisee in that cares about the customer experience.....Will never be back again

Well I guess its Not the fault of this location, but BK in general...Headed Home from SA, I spotted the BK sign on the road sign, and starving at this point...I figured I would hit them up with the 5 for $4 TV ad that comes across scrolling across every 5 minutes...Im really not a fan of any fast food, so I dont know why I torture myself every time I go, but come on...5 items for $4...I do Like value, but I should have known, How real could something like this Be...Now the meal was hot and fresh, not a problem with service. As you can see by the photo, you would think I was about 7'2" and have a really small mouth, but NO...that is actual size of the burger, and was gone in about 4 bites. This is a Zero Bang For You Buck Award!!! I think I have shown this photo to everyone I know!!...Once again, I have learned not to fall in the realm of False reality...And Have crossed BK off the List of Fast Food Joint...

Online says they are open until midnight this is the third time I have been by and they have been closed before 10:30. This particular time I came at 10:15 and the lights were already out. A staff member once told me they actually closed at 11 sooooo maybe you might to pick one time and actually stick to it

I have never seen such a disorganized, filthy fast food restaurant. 
I keep giving them chances but they keep failing.
I already stopped eating inside this franchise because it's so disgusting, and the fries all across the kitchen floor DO NOT HELP THE IMAGE. 
Staff never greets you with a smile at the window, and they don't even know what # the meal combos are on the drive thru menu.
7/10 times the fries are cold, or not warm at all. Same thing with the burgers.

PLEASE GO TO THE ONE IN BUDA, it's 5 minutes down the road and the customer service is exceptional. 

Putting in a call to corporate tonight for an internal audit of some sort, hopefully they either close this disgusting location or do some serious housecleaning. (PUN INTENDED)

Shut it down, Fire the manager, restart restaurant with new training and management. I am so disappointed that large chain restaurants allow their dinners to be run by people who obviously don't care what happens to the corporate name. Burger King has been making great strides in some areas but this one really needs an overhaul.
This place needs to go back to old school. Sitting here with no drink, small portions. The last one was better.

This is one of the worse McDonalds ever. So sad this is the biggest because it seems to lack on everything. Very unclean perhaps because it's always busy. Rude ghetto employees that make you want to leave midway through ordering. I think management was standing around, they should be cleaning if everyone else is busy. I ordered a crispy chicken sandwich meal and the chicken was old like it had been sitting for hours and tasted dry. Very disappointed as a tourist visiting the biggest McDonald's and definitely won't be back during my trip and wouldn't ever recommend.
Wow.  What an improvement over all other fast food places. You have try it to believe it.  The food, atmosphere, even the bathrooms, all great.

Best way to describe this unusual McDonalds is a hot mess. You walk in the door and are at once overwhelmed and unsure where to start. It took us a minute but we figured out where to start the ordering process but wait you don't pay here that's at the next station? Plus the worker taking out order messed it up but we didn't bother fixing it as we were pressed for time.

The food itself was hot and fresh and similar fare to other Mickey Ds. We sat at a bar with a giant fish tank in front us and had s good time picking out the socially challenged fishies. The folks we ran into working here didn't seem too happy but that could have been the early hour of the day.
Great Place with mega fun for the kids! I don't know what some r complaining abt, its not disney but a nice unique alternative to other Mickey D's restaurants.

This 'gourmet bistro mcdonalds' may be fun for kids as it does have arcade games (guitar hero, airhockey, basketball shot etc), bowling lane (small one lane) and its own gift shop where you could redeem tickets for prizes... but to me it felt a bit run down. 
 
Dining upstairs was not enjoyable with all the game sounds and lights flashing. It also seemed a bit odd as there was also two fish tanks and a ticket area where you could buy tickets to the theme parks (universal, disney, seaworld) a bit random.

Positives: 
- truly a different...slightly bizarre dining experience. good for out of towners
- icecream station where they would prepare icecream mixes similar to how cold stone creamery mixes in toppings
- garbage cans that say thank you
- automatic toilet seat changer

Negatives:
- felt like a run down Chucky cheese
- random decor; needs a more united theme
- pastrami sandwich was better than expected but less tasty then a real deli sandwich

Could be kept a bit cleaner but that guy was busy watching videos on his phone rather than making sure the tables were clean of trash and food. If you order from the Bistro side Lord knows it's a whole lot of food, I got the meal and needless to say I did not eat my fries and only 1/2 of my chimi. My husband had a Philly cheese steak meak he did not touch his fries and left some of his sandwhich. It was pretty good though not bad. Staff was not that friendly as they acted like they had better things to do than be there or we were bothering them. One man waited 20+mins for a burger, and fries. My oldest ordered a plain McChicken and plain Cheeseburger and she waited 20 mins. People were getting frustrated it was taking so long to get their food. Several people asked for their money back. It's fun place for the kids, just make sure to check out what might be happening each night. Might be animals, karaoke or something else new.

With my yelping skills, I found out that this Orlando, Florida's McDonald's was known as "The World's Largest Entertainment McDonald's". So, during my one week trip in Orlando, we made a pit stop here for a late night dinner after the theme parks. It was pretty packed for a late night dinner. This McDonald's had a bistro menu, which featured pizza, pasta, panini, sandwiches, wraps, and more. Besides the food differences noted in this McDonald's, on the second floor, they have a whole floor dedicated to arcade games. Perfect for the kids. It's actually quite confusing when ordering. You first have to wait in line to put in your order of food. After, you will need to wait in another line to pay for your food. Then you need to wait in line to pick up the food. Geez, I wish there was a more efficient way of doing this. 

Between the four of us, we decided not to get the usual McDonald's food and try their "bistro" food. We shared the following:

Angel Hair with Chicken: This was just OK. Chicken wasn't too dry nor too moist. The sauce was quite bland... :( Unfortunately, I think I can make better pasta myself.

Tortellini with Shrimp: I really liked the Tortellini mixed in Alfredo sauce. It was cooked perfectly and didn't have an odd taste to it. The shrimp wasn't too fresh though. :/

Pizza (Bacon, Pepperoni, Sausage, Chicken, Spinach, and Ham): I forgot what else we asked for in our pizza, but we had about 6 toppings. Not the greatest pizza I have had. Pizza was a bit dry.. It really was just OK. Not even memorable. 

The reason why I'm giving this two stars is also because 1) the person who was putting in our order kept messing up and didn't know where to find certain items on her computer. That was very annoying and we ended up having a receipt with higher prices than what it stated on the menu. We had to talk to the manager and she politely fixed up our whole order. Thank goodness for the manager. 2) When we went to pick up our food, they forgot to give us the garlic breads for both our pasta dishes. We had to tell her that it comes with the pasta dishes and she had to check before giving to us. Geez... Even if I come back to visit Florida in the future, not sure if I'll be back here again after my experience.

The staff is rude from having to deal with tourists all day. I get that. The tables are also very dirty and there is only one trashcan upstairs. The place could be so much more than it is if they weeded out the dismal employees.

Also they charge additional for drinks. A #3, #4, and a happy meal cost us $22.

When I went to this McDonald's, it wasnt for McDonald's.  I was upset because the hotel I was at, quality inn (formerly comfort inn) on universal and sand lake near the convention center, did NOT HAVE WIFI -- but claimed to.

Anyway, they were so helpful they used their own phones to help me find local places with wifi and of course showed me how fast theirs was. Size doesn't matter, even though this restaurant is big.  It's very high quality.  I believe the service outsizes any other McDonald's nationwide.

Waited 30 minutes for my to-go order of fries && apple pie....... and when I finally got my order, there was no ketchup. Atmosphere is nice here, free wifi. Service is slow as snails, why is there only ONE cashier at 11PM?? If you are in a rush, do not go here.

Wow, when you think you know McDonald...  If this is you first time here get ready for some confusion. And no it wasn't just me, almost everyone got to the front a realized we were suppose to order behind us, and than pay when we get to the from, and than step aside to wait for our food. 

Besides the weird food ordering situation this place is kinda cool. There are more food options and they also have hand scoop ice cream. The second floor is basically a big arcade area and a nice place for kids to play. The whole place isn't as clean as I would like it to be, trash and stuff on the ground and just general dirt. But I guess that's what you get in a high traffic area and a huge McDonald. 

All in all this was an ok McDonald's, it could be cleaning and workers could be friendlier/more informative.

This is the biggest McDonald's in America. It is two stories and is not your typical McDonald's. This McDonald's serves burgers, fries, pastas, pizza, sundaes, and much more. I was more impressed by the size of the restaurant, what they offer, and the cleanliness  of the restaurant. Your order is taken by a digital machine and you pay for your food at the register or at the machine. The children have a huge play area upstairs. They have stairs and elevators to get upstairs. The restrooms have plastic seat covers that changes itself after every use. Another fascinating experience in Orlando Florida.

This is the weirdest McDonald's I've ever been to... From the outside it looks like an average McDonalds but on the inside it literally looks like a jungle. I was so confused! Not to mention there were three songs playing at the same time on full blast and it was early in the morning, not really what I want to hear when I wake up. I got out with a huge headache. Besides that the pancakes were pretty good and there was a nice fish tank. Oh and also, what's up with the moon-headed piano guy???? O_o a little creepy. But anyways, if you don't mind blasting music and a circus-like atmosphere I would definitely recommend this mcdonalds!

It's not every day you review a McDonald's but this one is unique from many others. It has a whole floor to arcade games and the ordering floor is divided into two, one side for burgers etc and the other for pizza!! It even has blue bunny ice cream and paninis. I ordered a pepperoni pizza with garlic oil on top so it appeared to be greasy. They forgot the most important ingredient, tomato sauce -___-

Aside from that my pizza was actually good. Thinly crust BUT so small for $10. It only comes with one topping and one veggie topping and each additional costed $1. It sucks that they only gave me FOUR pepperoni pieces. Boooo. The pineapples added were too big of a chunk but were a nice touch of sweetness. Cool to try out but I'd rather buy a hot n ready $5 from little Caesars where you get a much larger pizza and more toppings

I'm pretty much only rating this fast food restaurant b/c I thought it pretty cool that a McDonald's exists that serves something other than your typical McD's food. This place - you can get paninis, Belgian waffles, and even build your own pasta! AND it's open 24/7 for both the drive-thru AND dining area! Insane...  The wife and I stopped here after an exhausting day @ Magic Kingdom and kept it pretty simple (regular hamburger, fries), so I can't comment on the quality of the unique offerings. But if you're looking for some late-night variety in a familiar building, and don't feel like a Friday's, Perkins, or Denny's, this might be the option for you.

I freakin' wish Alabama would pull this kinda thing and take a chance on doing something out of the ordinary. Orlando: 28 - Birmingham: 0

I hate McDonalds. But our concierge actually recommended it as an experience and...When in Rome. So we stopped by late afternoon for a shake and was not disappointed. Heck! I gave it 5 stars! This is like Las Vegas for kids. Flashing lights. Noises everywhere. Kids begging for quarters. A huge playground. A fish tank in the lobby. A stage for magic shows. A bowling alley for Lord's sake!! And just when you thought you'd really seen it all...a grotto/water fountain in the corner. The menu is different too. They offer lots of desserts and more "upscale" items. We didn't eat there so I can't vouch for the food, but I took a pic for the review. Overall. In terms of being an Orlando experience, I give it a perfect score! (Oh...they don't really use quarters, you actually have to purchase a card to swipe on the games. But it's actually a keeper, I think, for the scrap book!)

Dirty but awesome.   Bathroom was trashed.  Trash in all the tables.  Get past that and it had a huge play place and arcade.   Like McMoon playing piano.   Face painter did an amazing job on the girls!!!  Balloons for all.   Proves that even ordering on a computer that a human can still mess up the meal.  Manager fixed my burger and gave us all ice cream.  Nice dessert area.

Just simply amazing the pasta, the pizza (I know McDonald's has pizza, crazy)! Everything is a touch screen or you can order like regular. It's probably the best you will ever eat at. I wish they would make the ones where I'm at like this.

Another tourist to Orlando here and I had to visit this McD's location.  Actually, the most recent visit was the second visit, as I checked it out the last time we were in Orlando.  On both occasions, I'd say the food was fine.  The arcade and play area is fine too.  However, the service was awful.  Upon requesting for an extra plate and silverware (my lil ones were sharing a breakfast platter), the employee had the audacity to roll her eyes and didn't even bother to get the plate.  She pretty much shoved the silverware into my hand and went back to gossiping with her coworkers.  Rude much?  I found service to be just as awful at my first visit back in 2010.  If good customer service is not that important to you, the overall experience isn't horrible.  It's definitely a place where you can kill time with the amusements available and grab a cheap bite to eat.

The world's largest McDonald's is right here in Orlando, Florida. Two stories with essential a two-story play area on the second floor next to a good sized arcade. There's a nice separate bakery that has the usual McDonald's stuff plus some things  like assorted ice cream. They also serve pizza and pasta here, but didn't try. The kids were so excited just to say they went here.

One of the worst experiences in McDonald's ever! We came in at 11:30 on Memorial Day night, which means the city is really busy. When we got to the restaurant they didn't have that many people in line but a lot of staff, nevertheless when we ordered pasta, it took us almost 40 minutes to get it! The lady in the kitchen was taking her sweet time, all other employees were joking and talking around instead of helping her. When she finally made our pasta(which took her like 5 minutes to do, and she only had 2 orders in front of us) the expo girl was just standing there until we actually told her that our food was ready and she can hand it to us. Doesn't really seem like manager really cares what is going on there. Good that they keep the place clean though. Definitely don't come there when you are in a rush!

P.S. Alfredo pasta is just awful! It got no flavor, chicken is frozen and it was like 13 dollars for tasteless ripoff!

Five stars if you feel like crap and need some recovery food. This particular McDonald's is a must see attractions in Orlando located on the corner of Sandlake Road and International dr it is the worlds largest McDonald's that has play house. The drive-through is two lanes now that they completed the renovation. At this McDonald's you can choose to have your classic burger or a brick oven pizza.

It's a big McDonald's, which also serves pizza and pasta. You can also order from a touch screen menu, and there's an arcade. I didn't get to go here when they had all the cool stuff inside. Now it looks pretty sterile and like every other McDonald's in the world. They even have slow service, just to give you that normal McDonald's fee we've all grown to know!

where do you take 7 hungry kids and 8 hungry kids on a budget?  the world's largest mcdonald's in florida!  

we thought we were just stopping into a bigger than normal mickey dee's with a normal menu.  wrong!  on top of the regular menu, this place had a bistro section (pastas, sandwiches, pizzas, etc), ice cream section (serving shakes, big scoops of ice cream), and a 2nd floor full of games. (think chuck e. cheese meets mickey dee's meets baskin robbins meets an italian place).

there was definitely lots to do for the kids but finding a place to sit was tricky.  cleanliness wise, it was just OK.  the floors felt sticky and it was hard to find a clean table.  service wise, they seemed efficient but on one of our second trips to the register, the lady helping me seemed clueless about how to punch in an order for french fries.  random, right?  

would still recommend checking this place out though.

A great fun place for the whole family! This 24 hour World's Largest Entertainment McDonald's & PlayPlace is definitely not your typical Golden Arches. This Micky D's has two levels including the restaurant/bistro and tourist info center on the first floor and PlayPlace, arcade games, and games with prizes on the second floor. Much love to the cool vintage Mac Tonight in the dining room! There's also a gift shop here which sells some cool McDonald's souvenirs and apparel. I would love to have my birthday party here if I was 5 yo again!

This McDonald's offers not only the typical core menu of Big Macs, Quarter Pounders, Filet O' Fish, Egg McMuffins, etc., but also a Bistro Gourmet menu with breakfast (Belgian waffles, omelettes, French toast), gourmet sandwiches & paninis, wraps, pizza, pasta dishes, taco salads, chimichangas, desserts (Blue Bunny ice cream, cookies, cakes, cheesecake), and more.

There are over 40 Extra Value Meals (Breakfast & Lunch/Dinner) offered which include the core McD's meals (with fries/hash browns & drink) and the Bistro Gourmet meals (offers choice of fries or side salad & drink), under $10 each. You can order inside & see the display case of actual bistro items or also use the drive-thru to order bistro items.  Check out the details, menu items, online coupons, and other Bistro theme locations at http://www.mcfun.com

Since I went out on the town very late last weekend, I was getting hungry and stopped here around 2AM for the #30 Extra Value Meal Pastrami Sandwich with Side Salad & Medium Diet Coke ($8.49). I was so "McLovin" it here!!! However, I didn't try to buy any booze with a Hawaii fake ID and ride around with the Police or go to any house parties like the McLovin character in "Superbad" who really cracks me up!!

LOCATION: Sand Lake Rd & International Dr, right smack in the middle of tourist central!

Yes, its a tourist trap. Yes, its always packed. Yes, its probably overrated. But it is NOT your average Mcdonalds. They have a Bistro menu, which has tons of different options (Salads/burritos/pizza/wraps/etc.). It is a unique Mcdonalds and has a complete video game room upstairs. There isnt anything crazy that you could spend alot time with here, but the novelty itself is worth going for.

Visité este local de McDonald's porque supuestamente es el más grande del mundo y eso despertó curiosidad. El local es enorme con aérea de juegos y además del menú típico de hamburguesas ofrece pizzas y pastas. Solo pedí una hamburguesa que era aceptable y compre una tarjeta para los juegos que se encuentran en el segundo nivel. La experiencia fue satisfactoria y vale la pena conocer esta sucursal.

This is a high-tech McDonald's with lots employees doing nothing but standing around and talking to each other! Tried to get help to customize my order on the touchscreen and employee was very rude!
